title.en: Prayer to Khyentse, Kongtrul and Chokling1

text.en: Manifestation of Vairotsana, treasure of anocean of qualities(Yönten Gyatso),
text.en-trans: bairo ngö nang yönten gyatsö ter

text.en: Venerable One ofinfinite intelligence(Lodrö Tayé), prophesied by the Victors
Lord of the Dance, majestic tamer of beings(Garwang Drodül Tsal), cared for by Padmsambhava,
text.en-trans: pemé jezung gar wang drodul tsal

text.en: Sanctuary of the two teachings(Tennyi Lingpa)2—at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: ten nyi lingpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Great regent of Orgyen(Orgyen Gyaltsap), Emanation of the prince,
Universal monarch of all emanatedgreat treasure revealers(Trülpé Terchen),
text.en-trans: trulpé terchen yong kyi khorlö gyur
drubpa chok gi yeshe ngön du gyur

text.en: Sanctuary of great bliss(Dechen Lingpa)3—at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: dechen lingpé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Emanation of the Dharma King,4blessed by Vimalamitra,
text.en-trans: chögyal namtrul bi mé jin gyi lab

text.en: Great charioteer of the vast and profound transmissions,
Manifestation of Mañjuśrī, treasure ofwisdom, love(Khyentsé), and power,
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö khyen tsé nü pé ter

text.en: Sanctuary of Sūtra and Mantra(Do-ngak Lingpa)5—at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: do ngak lingpé zhab la solwa deb
